thread.title: VW's biggest management revamp in a decade

title: VW's biggest management revamp in a decade
text:
VW's biggest management revamp in a decade 12:30am IST - 01:37 
As part of what could be the biggest shake-up at Volkswagen in a decade, Chief Executive Matthias Mueller is due to be replaced by Herbert Diess, head of VW's core autos brand, who has repeatedly clashed with unions over cost cuts. Ciara Lee reports
